biotools.summary: Computational method for detecting significantly recurrent identity by descent (IBD) in a set of haplotypes. This tool was designed for the discovery of founder mutations in dense SNP array data from a population sample of tumors.

bioschemas.name: FounderTracker
bioschemas.summary: Computational method for detecting significantly recurrent identity by descent (IBD) in a set of haplotypes. This tool was designed for the discovery of founder mutations in dense SNP array data from a population sample of tumors.
